modName: American Werewolf in London Sounds v2
descriptionHtml:
In this new version I replaced more than just the transformation howl with soundclips from the movie [i]An American Werewolf in London.[/i] I even replaced the explosion sfx with the distant AAWL howl, to give the actual howl an echoing effect.

Other sounds replaced:
Feeding
Feedingkill
Maul
Death cries
Breathing
Attacking

Recommended mods:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59463/?]Moonlight Tales - Werewolf Essentials[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20310/?]Werewolf Transformation Sound Replacer[/url] (install before mine)


Note: I'm not going to upload a preview video this time. If you want to judge the sound files before you use them, just double-click on them via WinRar. If anyone is willing to throw together an ingame video that plays the sounds, that would be great!
author: T3alrose
